Articles.Content:
(bleep) Hello, Mitsy, Mission Control here, its time to go for your space walk.... (beep)

(Bloop) Mission Control, roger that, looking forward to it... (Bleep)

(Bleep) Roger that Mitsy....(beep)

(Bloop) OK, here I go... wish me luck.... opening hatch, NOW....(bleep)

(bleep)Hey, Mitsy, you DID remember to put your helmet on, didn't you?(beep)

...

...

...

(Bleep)Hello? Mitsy????.......(beep)

...

...

...

(Bleep)damn it. Stupid kerbal...(beep)
What is this supposed to be?
